name: Bingo Fuel
description:
Small game created for the FZ game jam 2021. Manage your resources while sending your fighters to deal with an alien threat

All assets but the font was created by me.

Gameplay:

  • Select mission by navigating the overworld
  • Choose which fighters to use (be aware, you can only use an aircraft for one battle!)
  • Try to save as many resources as possible for the later missions
